sentences.en: As the lungs exhale this waste, gas is expelled into the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 当肺呼出这股废气，气体就被排到空气中。

sentences.en: Daily brushing of the skin helps the skin expel toxins.
sentences.cn: 每天擦洗皮肤有助于皮肤排毒。

sentences.en: Foreign priests were expelled from the country.
God will judge those outside. " Expel the wicked man from among you. "
sentences.cn: 13至于外人 有神 审判他们. 你们应当把那恶人从你们中间赶出去.

sentences.en: He could not expel from his mind the persuasion that he should see Marianne no more.
sentences.cn: 他无法从脑子里驱走这一想法:他再也见不到玛丽安了.

sentences.en: Is that antidote strong enough to expel the poison?
sentences.cn: 这种解毒药有那么强,能驱散毒素 吗 ?

sentences.en: It has the power to expel companies or dealers believed to be dishonest or insolvent.
sentences.cn: 它有权开除那些被认为不守信用或无偿付能力的公司或经纪人.

sentences.en: It was the dream of Isabella's life to expel them for ever.
sentences.cn: 把他们永远从这片土地上赶出去是伊莎贝拉一生的愿望.

sentences.en: More than five-thousand high school students have been expelled for cheating.
sentences.cn: 五千多名中学生因考试作弊而被开除。

sentences.en: The headmaster may expel the boy from the school.
sentences.cn: 校长可能要把那个男孩从学校开除.

sentences.en: They both take in and expel matter.
sentences.cn: 他们既吸取物质也排放物质.

sentences.en: They threatened to expel him from his adoptive country.
sentences.cn: 他们威胁将他驱逐出他的移居国。

sentences.en: They were told at first that they should simply expel the refugees.
sentences.cn: 一开始有人告诉他们应该直接将那些难民驱逐出境。

sentences.en: This serves to expel me from every place where I go.
sentences.cn: 这东西害我处处受人撵.

sentences.en: To expel ( gas ) noisily from stomach through the mouth; burp.
sentences.cn: 从胃里通过嘴有声音地排出 ( 气体 ); 打(嗝)

sentences.en: Two girls were expelled from school for taking drugs.
sentences.cn: 两名女生因吸毒而被学校开除。

sentences.en: We have no alternative but to expel you from the factory.
sentences.cn: 把你开除厂籍是不得已的事情.

sentences.en: We managed to expel the enemy from the trench.
sentences.cn: 我们终于把敌人赶出战壕.

sentences.en: When you sneeze , you expel air from your lungs.
sentences.cn: 打喷嚏时会排出肺部的空气.

trans.tran_en: to officially force someone to leave a school or organization

trans.tran_cn: 把…除名， 把…开除； 驱逐， 赶走， 放逐； 排出， 喷出
trans.tran_en: to officially force someone to leave a school or organization
